thread.title: Ayesha Takia, Shraddha Kapoor, Priyanka Chopra: These 7 actresses look so different now – view pics
thread.title_full: Ayesha Takia, Shraddha Kapoor, Priyanka Chopra: These 7 actresses look so different now – view pics

author: Snehal Rajani
title: Ayesha Takia, Shraddha Kapoor, Priyanka Chopra: These 7 actresses look so different now – view pics
text:
Lakme Fashion Week 2017 Day 3: Vaani Kapoor, Diana Penty, Nimrat Kaur steal the limelight 
Ayesha Takia recently made an appearance at an event and she looked almost unrecognisable. The internet is flooded with stories of how she looks different now and a number of websites have said that, “she has undergone a lip job and has botox implants.” If you actually go to see her pictures from her initial days in Bollywood, the difference is evident. It is quite obvious that she looks different now. (ALSO READ: Ayesha Takia gets compared to Kylie Jenner after her SHOCKING transformation pics go viral! ) 
We don’t know how far is it true, but Ayesha isn’t the first Bollywood actress to have undergone a drastic makeover. Just a couple of months ago, Vaani Kapoor made it to the headlines for the same reason and so did Shraddha Kapoor. While actresses have always chosen to keep mum on this subject, you know the internet is a mean place. People can get really rude and nasty with their comments on social media and that’s what exactly happened when Ayesha’s photos went viral online. 
Here’s taking a look at 7 Bollywood actresses who look way different from what they looked like before. 
Ayesha Takia
